articles.title: Celebratory mood at Mar-a-Lago despite market drop after Trump's 'Liberation Day' tariffs: 'Felt like a rally'
articles.description: There was a celebratory mood at Mar-a-Lago following "Liberation Day" despite stock market drop after sweeping tariffs.
articles.content:
As the country reels over President Donald Trump’s tariffs, it’s a party at the “winter White House.”

articles.author: Sky News
articles.title: In the idyllic Cognac region of southern France, Trump's tariffs threaten a centuries-old way of life
articles.description: Pierre Louis Giboin's family have been making cognac for more than 200 years and have faced threats from war, the weather and pestilence. But never, until recently, from one of their best customers.
articles.content:
The impact of Trump's tariffs is reaching deep into every economy.
We travelled into the French rural heartland, heading for Cognac - the home of French brandy.
It is only half the size of Surrey but its exports to America are worth €1bn a year and t... [5331 chars]
